resources.string: This application contains everything I\'ve learned, the list below sends the user to different activities that works like a showcase.
This activity shows different types of buttons and their uses. \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity shows a simple TextView wich can\'t be edited by the user and a editText where the user can type. \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity allows the user to type a text and send to another activity by pressing "send". \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
